params.name: inputs
params.description: The input predicted tensor. Its dtype is float32 and has a shape of [batch_size, sequence_length, num_tags].

params.name: labels
params.description: The input label tensor. Its dtype is int64 and has a shape of [batch_size, sequence_length]

params.name: lengths
params.description: The input length. Its dtype is int64 and has a shape of [batch_size].

return.description: Returns the unnormalized sequence scores tensor unnorm_score. Its dtype is float32 and has a shape of [batch_size].
